description: Borrowed from Latin palmaris. May be decomposed as palm +â€Ž -ar.

adjectives.description: palmar (comparative more palmar, superlative most palmar)

entries.meaning: (anatomy, not comparable) Of or pertaining to the palm of the hand or comparable appendage.
(anatomy and medicine) In the direction of the palm.
(zoology) Of or relating to the underside of the wings of birds.
